source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Lean Problem-Solving for Team Members and Leaders

visible_instructors.title: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.name: Lawrence M.
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Author & Leadership Coach
visible_instructors.display_name: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence

items.headline: Problem Solving Is The Core Activity of Continuous Improvement that Every Team Member Should Know
objectives_summary: You will develop the attitudes and habits of team problem-solving that produce performance improvement.
You will learn three models of problem-solving associated with Toyota Production System or "lean management."
You will learn and apply a simple and direct approach to root cause analysis and situation analysis.

items.title: Culture | How to Manage Team Conflict
items.headline: Understand how to harness healthy conflict in teams and how to manage conflict conversations
objectives_summary: Understand how perceptions create conflict
Determine factors that create unhealthy team conflict
Harness healthy conflict in teams

items.title: Mastering Conflict Management and Resolution at Work
items.headline: Discover what happens to you in conflict, use tools to resolve any conflict, and strengthen your relationships
objectives_summary: Define conflict and identify your conflict handling style
Use strategies to manage your defensiveness
Tools to help you resolve any conflict and remain calm in heated arguments

items.title: Agile Project Management: Scrum Step by Step with Examples

visible_instructors.title: Paul Ashun
visible_instructors.name: Paul
visible_instructors.job_title: CSM, Author-Scrum Productivity Books, CEO Pashun Consulting

items.headline: Explained with examples based on the real world for scrum master, product owner, team and project manager in industry
objectives_summary: Learn "in depth" how to carry out all the scrum practices like the pros, such as Sprint Planning and agile practices like Release Planning for effective efficient project delivery
Learn what scrum is and why it is so powerful for delivering projects on time

Learn in depth how to use agile practices like Velocity, Capacity Driven Planning, Velocity Driven Planning, Release Planning, Kick Off Meetings, Continuous Improvement and more Learn how to improve running Agile Scrum projects in real world scenarios.

items.title: Be a Great Mentor: A Practical Guide to Mentorship

visible_instructors.title: JeanAnn Nichols
visible_instructors.name: JeanAnn
visible_instructors.job_title: Executive Mentor  |  Leadership Coach  |  Keynote Speaker

items.headline: Grow your career through mentoring, whether you're a manager, leader, subject matter expert, or individual contributor
objectives_summary: Get clarity on the value you bring as a mentor
Identify and select your ideal mentee
Build your mentoring skills

items.title: Customer | How to Build a Customer Service Strategy
items.headline: For you and your team to be successful in providing great customer service, start by putting your customer first
objectives_summary: Place your customer at the front of your business
Recognise actions that can damage a customer centric culture
Develop a customer centric service strategy

items.title: Giving and Receiving Feedback for Management and Leadership

visible_instructors.title: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.name: Lawrence M.
visible_instructors.display_name: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Author & Leadership Coach

items.headline: How to Give Powerful and Effective Feedback - A Critical Human Resource Development Skill Required of All Managers
objectives_summary: You will be able to use a structured model for giving feedback in a positive and helpful way.
You will assure behavior change by developing action plans and accountability.
You will learn the essential attitudes or mindset that leads to effective feedback.

items.title: Leadership: The Emotionally Intelligent Leader
items.headline: How to work with and manage the emotional climate of your team to build trust and develop relationships.
objectives_summary: Discover ways of working with emotional intelligence that lead to better outcomes with the people that you are responsible for
Determine the best ways to manage and work with energy by utilising sources of energy to support energy dimensions
Explore behavioral preferences and how to work with others with different preferences

items.title: Coaching Managers & Leaders for Continuous Improvement

visible_instructors.title: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.name: Lawrence M.
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Author & Leadership Coach
visible_instructors.display_name: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence

items.headline: Coaching for Lean Leadership, Continuous Improvement  and Business Performance
objectives_summary: The student will develop the essentials skills of coaching managers, leaders and teams for continuous improvement.
To coach leaders and managers to improve key performance measures.
To coach leaders and managers to develop the critical skills of team leadership.

items.title: Team Leadership & Team Management Skills Certification

visible_instructors.title: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.name: Lawrence M.
visible_instructors.display_name: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Author & Leadership Coach

items.headline: Green Belt Certification in Teamwork Skills, Problem Solving, Process Improvement & Lean Continuous Improvement
objectives_summary: This course now includes two complete books, more than forty downloadable articles, assignments and self-assessments; in addition to a thirty-day money back guarantee!
You will learn the most important skill for success at every level of management...bringing the best out of people.
This course will give you all the tools you will need to develop high performing teams.

items.title: The Essential Guide for Effective Managers
items.headline: Master flexible leadership and effective communication to build your leadership brand AND drive performance
objectives_summary: Increase your team performance
Foster empowering work relationships
Grow your leadership potential

items.title: Culture | How to be a Great Coach
items.headline: Understand what coaching is and how you can use coaching and feedback to maintain and drive your culture
objectives_summary: Understand what coaching is
Understand the benefits of coaching
Identify and avoid coaching mistakes

items.title: QMS Auditor / Lead Auditor Course

visible_instructors.title: Sandeep Kumar ­
visible_instructors.name: Sandeep Kumar
visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Quality Director • Six Sigma Coach • Consultant

items.headline: Plan and Confidently Conduct Quality Management System Audits - Auditing Explained in Plain and Simple Language.
objectives_summary: Understand the roles and responsibilities of the auditor
Recognize the principles, practices, and types of audits
Prepare for the internal/external audits

items.title: Leading Virtual Teams - A Quick Course

visible_instructors.title: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.name: Lawrence M.
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Author & Leadership Coach
visible_instructors.display_name: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence

items.headline: How to Optimize the Effectiveness of Virtual Teams With Great Team Leadership
objectives_summary: You will lead online or virtual meetings that engage and respect all team members.
You will facilitate your team in a manner that leads to clear decisions and clear accountability.
You will develop effective meeting agendas and action plans.

items.title: Business Continuity Management System. ISO 22301.
items.headline: Prepare and respond to disruptive events. Continue operation. That's business continuity.
objectives_summary: What is a business continuity management system
What are the requirements of ISO 22301:2019
Key tools for business continuity like the business impact analysis or the risk assessment

items.title: ISO 31000 - Enterprise Risk Management for the Professional

visible_instructors.title: Avrohom Gluck
visible_instructors.name: Avrohom
visible_instructors.job_title: Adjunct Professor, Manhattanville School of Prof. Studies

items.headline: Create lasting change in your organization using risk management (ISO 31000:2018)
objectives_summary: Master a vocabulary for risk management you can use with ease
Know the principles for effectively managing risk
Gain the know-how to establish a framework for managing risk in your company
